item.title: Summary of tools for operating Windows GUI with Python
item.description: If it's the Web, there are famous places such as Selenium, but the impression is that there is no de facto tool for operating Windows GUI. In fact, there are so many choices that I’ll put them together here. Tools for operating Windows GUI with Python ahk ahk Â· PyPI A AutoHotkey wrapper for Python. Below are the samples on PyPI. from ahk import AHK from ahk.window import Window ahk = AHK() win = ahk.
